title: How to file an official customer service complaint
content:
Hi, 

 I have seen many have reported the fuzzy static screen on pixel 2. I have received poor customer support feedback. How can I file an official complaint to Google? 

 I have switched from iphone to Pixel, but did not expect such a poor built quality of Google phone and the funny thing is that the customer service manager from Google's call center has referred Google as a "software" manufacturer - that puts in me serious doubt about all "hardware" manufactured by Google. 

 Any one has any ideas? Or should we take it as that Google don't care? If so, I think we should start all considering switching back to Apple or Samsung for the phones and Amazon for the home connected products.

 Thanks
